channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Empowering every developer with trusted Microsoft insights

item.title: 【Announcing LangChain integration for your SQL-based AI applications】宣布 LangChain 集成您基于 SQL 的 AI 应用程序
item.description: 【In today’s data-driven world, the ability to seamlessly integrate various technologies is crucial for efficient data management and analysis. We’re excited to announce LangChain integration with Azure SQL Database and SQL database in Microsoft Fabric! LangChain, a powerful tool for building solutions with language models, can be effectively combined with these services to build AI-ready […]】在当今数据驱动的世界中，无缝集成各种技术的能力对于高效的数据管理和分析至关重要。我们很高兴地宣布 LangChain 与 Azure SQL 数据库和 Microsoft Fabric 中的 SQL 数据库集成！ LangChain 是一个使用语言模型构建解决方案的强大工具，可以有效地与这些服务结合起来，构建人工智能就绪的 […]

item.title: 【Announcing the Public Preview of AI Shell】宣布 AI Shell 公开预览版
item.description: 【We are pleased to announce the public preview of AI Shell.】我们很高兴地宣布 AI Shell 公开预览版。

item.title: 【Introducing the enhanced MSSQL Extension for Visual Studio Code】介绍 Visual Studio Code 的增强型 MSSQL 扩展
item.description: 【The MSSQL extension for Visual Studio Code is designed to support developers in building applications that use Azure SQL (including Azure SQL Database, Azure SQL Managed Instance, and SQL Server on Azure VMs), SQL Database in Fabric (Preview) or SQL Server as backend databases. With a comprehensive suite of features for connecting to databases, designing […]】Visual Studio Code 的 MSSQL 扩展旨在支持开发人员构建使用 Azure SQL（包括 Azure SQL 数据库、Azure SQL 托管实例和 Azure VM 上的 SQL Server）、Fabric 中的 SQL 数据库（预览版）或 SQL Server 作为后端的应用程序数据库。具有用于连接数据库的全面功能套件，设计[...]

item.title: 【dotnet scaffold – Next Generation Project Creation for .NET】dotnet 脚手架 – .NET 的下一代项目创建
item.description: 【Introducing a new command line tool dotnet scaffold, a new interactive way to create projects in .NET.】引入新的命令行工具 dotnetscaffold，这是一种在 .NET 中创建项目的新交互方式。

item.title: 【How do I determine whether Explorer is showing or hiding file extensions?】如何确定资源管理器是显示还是隐藏文件扩展名？
item.description: 【You can ask, but maybe you're asking the wrong question.】你可以问，但也许你问错了问题。

item.title: 【Azure Cosmos DB Shines at Microsoft Ignite 2024!】Azure Cosmos DB 在 Microsoft Ignite 2024 上大放异彩！
item.description: 【Microsoft Ignite 2024 took over the Windy City this week, bringing with it new technological innovation and exciting product announcements aplenty! If you missed the first day of the show, don’t worry – we’ve got you covered with all the latest and greatest Azure Cosmos DB news. This year’s event saw great enthusiasm and attendance […]】Microsoft Ignite 2024 本周接管了风城，带来了新的技术创新和令人兴奋的产品发布！如果您错过了展会的第一天，请不要担心 – 我们为您提供了所有最新、最精彩的 Azure Cosmos DB 新闻。今年的活动热情高涨，出席人数众多 […]

item.title: 【What’s new for Office Add-ins at Ignite 2024】Ignite 2024 上的 Office 加载项新增功能
item.description: 【The Office Platform team has been busy working on improvements to the platform since we last reported. This blog covers the new features from the office-js team announced at Ignite 2024.】自我们上次报道以来，Office 平台团队一直忙于对该平台进行改进。本博客介绍了 Office-js 团队在 Ignite 2024 上宣布的新功能。

item.title: 【Introducing the new Linux-based Azure Cosmos DB Emulator (Preview)】推出新的基于 Linux 的 Azure Cosmos DB 模拟器（预览版）
item.description: 【We are excited to announce the preview release of the new Linux-based Azure Cosmos DB Emulator! This latest version is built to provide faster startup times and broader platform compatibility, addressing one of the most requested features in the Azure Cosmos DB User Voice community. The emulator can now seamlessly run on Apple silicon and […]】我们很高兴地宣布推出基于 Linux 的新 Azure Cosmos DB 模拟器的预览版！此最新版本旨在提供更快的启动时间和更广泛的平台兼容性，解决 Azure Cosmos DB 用户语音社区中最需要的功能之一。该模拟器现在可以在 Apple 芯片上无缝运行，并且 [...]

item.title: 【LangChain Integration for Vector Support for SQL-based AI applications】LangChain 集成为基于 SQL 的 AI 应用程序提供矢量支持
item.description: 【LangChain Integration for Vector Support for Azure SQL and SQL database in Microsoft Fabric Microsoft SQL now supports native vector search capabilities in Azure SQL and SQL database in Microsoft Fabric. We also released the langchain-sqlserver package, enabling the management of SQL Server as a Vectorstore in LangChain. In this step-by-step tutorial, we will show […]】LangChain 集成对 Microsoft Fabric 中的 Azure SQL 和 SQL 数据库的矢量支持 Microsoft SQL 现在支持 Azure SQL 中的本机矢量搜索功能和 Microsoft Fabric 中的 SQL 数据库。我们还发布了langchain-sqlserver包，支持将SQL Server作为LangChain中的Vectorstore进行管理。在本分步教程中，我们将展示[...]

item.title: 【Copy files across instances of Visual Studio】跨 Visual Studio 实例复制文件
item.description: 【Transferring code files between different instances of Visual Studio has often been a tedious task. To simplify this process, Visual Studio 2022 now includes a feature that allows you to easily copy and paste code files and folders between instances using the Solution Explorer. This enhancement aims to streamline workflow and save time. Until now, […]】在 Visual Studio 的不同实例之间传输代码文件通常是一项繁琐的任务。为了简化此过程，Visual Studio 2022 现在包含一项功能，允许您使用解决方案资源管理器在实例之间轻松复制和粘贴代码文件和文件夹。此增强功能旨在简化工作流程并节省时间。到目前为止， […]
